definition: The term "links" refers to the opposite direction or side of something. It is commonly used to describe the left side or left-hand direction. Additionally, it can be used to indicate a political ideology associated with progressive or socialist views.

examples.german: Sie hat den linken Schuh verloren.
Der linke Flügel des Gebäudes ist beschädigt.
examples.english: The left wing of the building is damaged.

examples.german: Er hat einen linken Haken bekommen.
